author: crayyy_zee
description: Allows the bot to count deleted messages in a sever and punish a user if he passes a threshold of deletes. Lets you set an exempt list of users and channels.
install_msg: For any support, visit the cog support server: https://discord.gg/GET4DVk and go to the `#support_othercogs` channel.
short: Count deleted messages and punish users
